content.rendered:
Quality Education

Nurturing Future Nation Builders Through Quality Education and Research

Following the many success stories of Jeffrey Cheah Foundation (JCF), Malaysia’s largest education-focused social enterprise in Malaysia, established to deliver quality education in perpetuity – we are now expanding our horizon to fulfil our pledge to refurbish and equip 50 libraries nationwide by 2024.
